title: Employee Updates Home Address
description: A staff member has moved and needs to update their home address for payroll and tax purposes.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and authenticate their identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the employee's identity.

tasks.description: Guide the employee to the self-service section of the HR portal to update their address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the employee to make the change themselves.

tasks.description: Confirm with the employee that the change was saved successfully.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the employee check that the new address is reflected in the portal.
